summary: This batch represents work across multiple e-commerce initiatives including price deprecation from products service, one-time purchase (OTP) implementation, checkout improvements, and various technical maintenance tasks. Major themes include payment flow optimization (Charge at Checkout), customer reactivation improvements, and test infrastructure cleanup. Several teams are coordinating on OTP functionality with dependencies between funnel and post-checkout work.

decisions.what: Deprecate prices from products service, moving to new price domain
decisions.rationale: Consumer core is planning changes to the price domain that require stopping consumption of prices from products service

decisions.what: Shift to Charge at Checkout model for first subscription order
decisions.rationale: Improve customer activation experience by providing immediate, transparent payment feedback instead of charging 4 days prior

decisions.what: Separate OTP work into Funnel and post-checkout epics
decisions.rationale: Divide concerns between funnel experience and post-checkout functionality for One-Time Purchase feature

decisions.what: Use OTP-specific confirmation component instead of subscription component
decisions.rationale: Display OTP-specific content for one-time purchase orders

decisions.what: Unify plan content mapping sources into single source of truth
decisions.rationale: Plan content was scattered across multiple hooks causing confusion and breaking staging

decisions.what: Highlight Christmas 2025 shipping delays instead of full holiday adjustment
decisions.rationale: ProPac closure on 2025-12-24/25 causes ship date delays for customers with cutoff on 2025-12-22/23

initiatives.name: Price Deprecation from products-service
initiatives.description: Remove pricing information consumption from products service across Good Chop website components

initiatives.name: One Time Purchase (OTP) - MVP
initiatives.description: Implement one-time purchase functionality for Good Chop, split between funnel and post-checkout work

initiatives.name: Charge at Checkout
initiatives.description: Shift payment model to charge customers immediately at checkout for first subscription order instead of 4 days prior to delivery

initiatives.name: Improve Reactivations page
initiatives.description: Address Good Chop's lowest-in-US-brands net reactivation rate of 8.7% in 2025 YTD

initiatives.name: Add-on vouchers as RAF reward
initiatives.description: Offer $10 deals voucher as reward for customers with Multi-Week Discount who refer friends

initiatives.name: Active Experience Updates (Q4/24 Post Launch)
initiatives.description: Updates to FactorForm active customer experience after initial launch, including holiday shipping notifications

blockers.description: OTP order traceability review blocked - orders not being identified on Katana/BOB/Owl
blockers.impact: Customer Care Ops cannot trace and check OTP orders and deliveries

blockers.description: E2E tests for different portions percentage blocked due to functionality not merged and feature flags not enabled
blockers.impact: Cannot validate quiz flows for portion percentage selection

technical_patterns.pattern: Component separation by use case (OTPConfirmation vs Subscription Confirmation)
technical_patterns.context: Creating dedicated components for different order types to display appropriate content

technical_patterns.pattern: Hook consolidation and separation of concerns
technical_patterns.context: Unifying scattered plan content mapping hooks and separating checkout vs non-checkout order summary hooks

technical_patterns.pattern: Quarantine system for flaky test management
technical_patterns.context: Preventing flaky tests from executing while maintaining test coverage and tracking success rates

technical_patterns.pattern: Feature flag gating for gradual rollout
technical_patterns.context: Using feature flags to control availability of new features like portion percentage selection
Emitting StatSig forward events to populate metrics data sources for add-to-cart tracking
Removing pricing from products service while maintaining oneOff price as exception

work_themes: Price domain migration and service deprecation
Test infrastructure and flaky test cleanup

dependencies.context: Funnel work (GOC-3177) separated from post-checkout work (GOC-3059) for OTP feature
Website must stop consuming prices from products service due to Consumer core changes
Need OTP order identification and traceability in order management systems
Menu creation required before making menu-addons-freecategory-gcs subscribable
Tests blocked until portion percentage functionality merged and feature flags enabled
Shipping delay notifications dependent on ProPac holiday closure schedule
